body: Is it only happening with a specific anything? Only on specific devices, Android versions, manufacturers, etc?

Hello. Thanks for answer. This only happened once on this phone Galaxy A10 (Android 11).

Here is layout:
```
<com.airbnb.lottie.LottieAnimationView
    android:id="@+id/img_logo1"
    android:layout_width="@dimen/_300sdp"
    android:layout_height="0dp"
    android:layout_weight="1"
    app:lottie_autoPlay="true"
    app:lottie_loop="false"
    app:lottie_rawRes="@raw/data"
    app:lottie_speed="1.5" />
```

build.gradle:
`implementation("com.airbnb.android:lottie:5.2.0")`

This is lottie_rawRes:
[data.zip](https://github.com/airbnb/lottie-android/files/10143096/data.zip)

My app (use VPN from Russia or Great Britain to install it):
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.financialaccounting.fincircle

Crashlytics:
![Crash](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/66782790/205351031-7ba8130e-392f-4a56-be03-cc77a47ad3e3.png)

In this video I show you Lottie animation, and it is working well on my Galaxy S22.

https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/66782790/205353419-4660f20a-9ba6-4f37-adfb-3c2ea5395b33.mp4
I just tested on Samsung Galaxy A10 in BrowserStack emulator. No errors.

issue.title: Add an extra null check for transform anchorPosition

repository.name: lottie-android
repository.description: Render After Effects animations natively on Android and iOS, Web, and React Native

issue.body:
Not sure why this is happening but it seems similar to #1955.

Fixes https://github.com/airbnb/lottie-android/issues/2194

body:
Hello. Can you please tell me how can I get this change? The version also remained 5.2.0. I see that you corrected the repository in the master branch, but I look in android studio and there is no change.

I tried also to write `implementation("com.github.airbnb:lottie-android:master")`

![Снимок экрана (17)](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/66782790/206261047-7f0cad73-5a61-4d14-a7c7-55513b18f4af.png)

I offer a thousand apologies. Android studio cannot find this version. Help me please.
![Снимок экрана 2022-12-08 005139](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/66782790/206304763-b136024a-ef46-46e3-ae04-0e9b07b4ea4d.png)
You have to add the maven snapshot repository `https://oss.sonatype.org/content/repositories/snapshots/`

Good day, [gpeal](https://github.com/gpeal)!

I got new same error but from another place:


![Снимок экрана 2022-12-10 173725](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/66782790/206860693-5e847075-178f-48f8-a652-e850b4948e93.png)

This user still uses library version 5.2.0

And here is the code from EllipseContent.java:86
```
85: PointF size = sizeAnimation.getValue();
86: float halfWidth = size.x / 2f;
87: float halfHeight = size.y / 2f;
```

It seems that we need to add a check for null here too.

issue.title: NullPointerException: float android.graphics.PointF.x in EllipseContent.java line 86

repository.name: lottie-android
repository.description: Render After Effects animations natively on Android and iOS, Web, and React Native

```
85: PointF size = sizeAnimation.getValue();
86: float halfWidth = size.x / 2f;
87: float halfHeight = size.y / 2f;
```

It seems that we need to add a check for null here.
